resources:
DeafTouch Open Close
This application helps to those people who has hearing issues. Through this application they can easily communicate to the people. This application can also use by a normal person when she/he wants to learn sign languages. This application has a features where you can learn proper hand sign of letters, greeting, emotion and etc. It has also unique features that you can play a quiz game where you will guess what word that the hand sign means.
